authors: Heather Miller-Kuhaneck, PhD, OTR/L, FAOTA, is Associate Professor, Department of Occupational Therapy, Sacred Heart University, Fairfield, CT.

Renee Watling, PhD, OTR/L, FAOTA, is Visiting Assistant Professor, School of Occupational Therapy, University of Puget Sound, Tacoma, WA, and Clinical Assistant Professor, Division of Occupational Therapy, University of Washington, Seattle; rwatling@pugetsound.edu.
journal: The American journal of occupational therapy : official publication of the American Occupational Therapy Association
title: Parental or Teacher Education and Coaching to Support Function and Participation of Children and Youth With Sensory Processing and Sensory Integration Challenges: A Systematic Review.
